about_the_game:
For centuries, the Realm has used fear and its military superiority to keep the Zerah Igna System under control. But a group of rebellious Ishma has risen to fight its tyranny. With their superior aerial combat skills, the Wind Runners will bring freedom to all who live under the shadow of oppression!

Wind Runners' Skills:

Choose one of the Wind Runners, each with their own play style:

Items:

Collect items during the incursions and build a powerful arsenal to reduce your enemies to dust.

Bosses:

Face the Cardinal Beasts piloted by the Saints, the knights handpicked by the King.

Planets:

During raids, choose which planet to attack next. Each planet offers opportunities to acquire unique resources.

Upgrades:

Accumulate resources over multiple raids to invest in the mothership sectors and unlock permanent upgrades.

Missions:

When attacking a planet, select your next mission and gain perks based on your needs.
detailed_description:
For centuries, the Realm has used fear and its military superiority to keep the Zerah Igna System under control. But a group of rebellious Ishma has risen to fight its tyranny. With their superior aerial combat skills, the Wind Runners will bring freedom to all who live under the shadow of oppression!

Wind Runners' Skills:

Choose one of the Wind Runners, each with their own play style:

Items:

Collect items during the incursions and build a powerful arsenal to reduce your enemies to dust.

Bosses:

Face the Cardinal Beasts piloted by the Saints, the knights handpicked by the King.

Planets:

During raids, choose which planet to attack next. Each planet offers opportunities to acquire unique resources.

Upgrades:

Accumulate resources over multiple raids to invest in the mothership sectors and unlock permanent upgrades.

Missions:

When attacking a planet, select your next mission and gain perks based on your needs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.8 to 10.12
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 2600, NVidia GeForce 9400 or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.8 to 10.12
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4670, NVidia GeForce GT 330 or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720

name: Wind Runners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720

short_description: Wind Runners is a roguelike side-scroller with intense aerial combat. Take on the role of a rebellious Ishma pilot, battling against the oppressive forces of the Realm in the Zerah Igna System. With challenging bosses, ever-changing maps, and fast-paced gameplay, every run is a fight for freedom.
